meanings.definition: A mark left on the skin from sucking or biting, typically on the neck.
meanings.sent1: She tried to hide the hickeys on her neck with a scarf.
meanings.sent2: He was embarrassed when his friends noticed the hickeys on his neck.
meanings.sent3: The hickeys on his neck made him look like a vampire!
meanings.sent4: Her neck was a canvas of hickeys, telling a story of a passionate night.
meanings.sent5: The hickeys on her neck were like a secret code only they understood.
